about.title: About Me
about.description:
My name is Antonis Ekatommatis, and I’m a self-motivated Full Stack Developer based in Chios, Greece. I specialize in building scalable internal tools and ERP-integrated platforms that solve real-world business problems.

I have hands-on experience in projects related to procurement workflows, asset management, and AI-powered product enrichment using technologies like NodeJS, React, MySQL, and Python.

Combining backend development with IT support and cloud infrastructure, I strive to deliver modern, reliable, and efficient software solutions. My mindset is driven by continuous learning and experimentation, always aiming to create meaningful impact through technology.

kokolias.title: Junior Software Engineer and Junior IT
kokolias.description: At Kokolias & Co., I actively contribute to the development and maintenance of internal web applications using technologies like Flask, NodeJS, React, and MySQL, supporting key operations such as asset tracking, procurement workflows, and sales reporting. I also manage databases and provide daily IT support, including server setups, PC provisioning, and network administration. In parallel, I deliver business applications through the Microsoft Power Platform, streamlining processes like leave requests, expense claims, and approval flows. Additionally, I assist in the company’s digital transformation through ERP and SharePoint API integrations, as well as by implementing scraping tools and AI-powered solutions for enriched product data management.

university.description: I studied at the Department of Informatics at the University of Piraeus, focusing on software development and intelligent systems. My curriculum included courses in algorithms, data structures, databases, artificial intelligence, and application development.
